meanings.definition: The quality or state of being absurd.
meanings.sent1: The absurdity of the situation made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: Her statement was met with disbelief due to its absurdity.
meanings.sent3: The absurdity of wearing a winter coat in the summer was comical.
meanings.sent4: The absurdity of trying to fit an elephant into a suitcase is evident.
meanings.sent5: The absurdity of a fish riding a bicycle is hard to forget.

meanings.sent1: The play was full of absurdity and made no sense.
meanings.sent2: His actions were an absurdity that no one could understand.
meanings.sent3: The absurdity of a cat wearing a top hat was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The absurdity of a flying pig captured everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The absurdity of a talking tree was beyond belief.

meanings.definition: The quality of being ridiculous or wildly unreasonable.
meanings.sent1: The absurdity of his demands was shocking.
meanings.sent2: The absurdity of the proposal left everyone speechless.
meanings.sent3: The absurdity of a penguin driving a car was hilarious.
meanings.sent4: The absurdity of a mountain dancing in the wind was surreal.
meanings.sent5: The absurdity of a banana wearing sunglasses was unforgettable.
